mapper.insert: insert into record(`name` , tel , cardId , `count` , orderId , selfOrderNumber , status) values (#{name} , #{tel} , #{cardId} , #{count} , #{orderId} , #{selfOrderNumber} , #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT IF (EXISTS(SELECT * FROM record WHERE tel = #{tel} and orderId = #{orderId}) , TRUE , FALSE)
